extracted_information: The provided web content is from the 'Prompting Techniques' page of the Prompt Engineering Guide. It also mentions a 'Guides' section with a link to 'Optimizing Prompts', which is relevant to LLM optimization strategies via prompting. The page lists numerous advanced prompting techniques.
